name: yulp
description: A low-level highly-efficient language for the Ethereum Virtual Machine.

scripts.build-browser: parcel build browser/index.html && cp browser_config/now.json dist/now.json
scripts.build-resolve: npm run make-gen-dir && nearleyc src/resolve.ne -o src/gen/resolve.js
scripts.build-yul: npm run make-gen-dir && nearleyc src/yul.ne -o src/gen/yul.js
scripts.build-yulplus: npm run make-gen-dir && nearleyc src/yulplus.ne -o src/gen/yulplus.js
scripts.build: npm run build-resolve && npm run build-yul && npm run build-yulplus

author: Nick Dodson <nick.dodson@fuel.sh>
